name: LordOfCoin
description: Lord of Coin. Lord of Coin finds the money, for you - to spend it.

functionDecorators.name: BURN_ADDRESS
functionDecorators.description: Address in which DVD are sent to be burned. These DVD can't be redeemed by the reserve.

functionDecorators.name: BUY_TAX_DENOMINATOR
functionDecorators.description: Applied to every buy of DVD before bonding curve tax.

functionDecorators.name: CURVE_TAX_DENOMINATOR
functionDecorators.description: Applied to every buy or sale of DVD.

functionDecorators.name: DIVIDER
functionDecorators.description: The slope of the bonding curve.

functionDecorators.name: SELL_TAX_DENOMINATOR
functionDecorators.description: Applied to every sale of DVD after bonding curve tax.

functionDecorators.name: SNAPSHOT_DURATION
functionDecorators.description: Snapshot duration.

functionDecorators.name: buy
functionDecorators.description: Exchanges mUSD to DVD. mUSD to be exchanged needs to be approved first.

functionDecorators.name: buyFromETH
functionDecorators.description: Exchanges ETH to DVD.

functionDecorators.name: buyTo
functionDecorators.description: Exchanges mUSD to DVD. mUSD to be exchanged needs to be approved first.

functionDecorators.name: checkSnapshot
functionDecorators.description: Check if we need to create new snapshot.

functionDecorators.name: claimDividend
functionDecorators.description: Claim dividend in mUSD.

functionDecorators.name: claimDividendETH
functionDecorators.description: Claim dividend in ETH.

functionDecorators.name: claimDividendTo
functionDecorators.description: Claim dividend in mUSD.

functionDecorators.name: claimableDividend
functionDecorators.description: Get claimable dividend for address.

functionDecorators.name: claimableProfit
functionDecorators.description: Total claimable profit.

functionDecorators.name: claimableProfitAt
functionDecorators.description: Total claimable profit in snapshot.

functionDecorators.name: depositTradingProfit
functionDecorators.description: Deposit trading profit to vault.

functionDecorators.name: devTreasury
functionDecorators.description: Dev treasury.

functionDecorators.name: dividendPayingSDVDSupply
functionDecorators.description: Total supply of Dividend-paying SDVD.

returnDecorators.description: Total supply of SDVD in wei.

functionDecorators.name: dividendPayingSDVDSupplyAt
functionDecorators.description: Total supply of Dividend-paying SDVD in snapshot.

returnDecorators.description: Total supply of SDVD in wei.

functionDecorators.name: dvd
functionDecorators.description: Dvd token instance.

functionDecorators.name: dvdBurnedAmount
functionDecorators.description: Total DVD that have been burned. These DVD are still in circulation therefore they are still considered on the bonding curve formula.

functionDecorators.name: dvdPool
functionDecorators.description: DVD farming pool.

functionDecorators.name: dvdPrice
functionDecorators.description: DVD price in wei according to the bonding curve formula.

functionDecorators.name: dvdPriceFloor
functionDecorators.description: DVD price floor in wei according to the bonding curve formula.

returnDecorators.description: Current DVD price floor in wei.

functionDecorators.name: dvdToReserve
functionDecorators.description: Calculates the amount of reserve in exchange for DVD.

parameterDecorators.name: tokenAmount
parameterDecorators.description: Token value in wei to use in the conversion.

functionDecorators.name: dvdToReserveTaxed
functionDecorators.description: Calculates the amount of reserve in exchange for DVD after applying bonding curve tax.

parameterDecorators.name: tokenAmount
parameterDecorators.description: Token value in wei to use in the conversion.

returnDecorators.description: Reserve amount in wei after the 10% tax has been applied.

functionDecorators.name: dvdTotalSupply
functionDecorators.description: Total supply of DVD. This includes burned DVD.

returnDecorators.description: Total supply of DVD in wei.

functionDecorators.name: isDividendClaimedAt
functionDecorators.description: Check if dividend already claimed by account.

functionDecorators.name: isMarketOpen
functionDecorators.description: Current state of the application. Either already open (true) or not yet (false).

functionDecorators.name: marketOpenTime
functionDecorators.description: Market will be open on this timestamp.

functionDecorators.name: poolTreasury
functionDecorators.description: Pool treasury.

functionDecorators.name: releaseTreasury
functionDecorators.description: Release treasury.

functionDecorators.name: reserveToDVD
functionDecorators.description: Calculates the amount of DVD in exchange for reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: reserveAmount
parameterDecorators.description: Reserve value in wei to use in the conversion.

functionDecorators.name: reserveToDVDTaxed
functionDecorators.description: Calculates the amount of DVD in exchange for reserve after applying bonding curve tax.

parameterDecorators.name: reserveAmount
parameterDecorators.description: Reserve value in wei to use in the conversion.

returnDecorators.description: Token amount in wei after the 10% tax has been applied.

functionDecorators.name: sdvd
functionDecorators.description: SDvd token instance.

functionDecorators.name: sdvdEthPairAddress
functionDecorators.description: Pair address for SDVD-ETH on uniswap.

functionDecorators.name: sdvdEthPool
functionDecorators.description: SDVD-ETH farming pool.

functionDecorators.name: sell
functionDecorators.description: Exchanges DVD to mUSD.

functionDecorators.name: sellTo
functionDecorators.description: Exchanges DVD to mUSD.

functionDecorators.name: sellToETH
functionDecorators.description: Exchanges DVD to ETH.

functionDecorators.name: snapshotId
functionDecorators.description: Current snapshot id Can be thought as week index, since snapshot is increased per week.

functionDecorators.name: snapshotTime
functionDecorators.description: Snapshot timestamp.

functionDecorators.name: totalDividendClaimed
functionDecorators.description: Total dividend earned since the contract deployment.

functionDecorators.name: totalLockedReserve
functionDecorators.description: Total mUSD that is now forever locked in the protocol.

functionDecorators.name: totalProfit
functionDecorators.description: Total profit.

functionDecorators.name: totalProfitAt
functionDecorators.description: Total profit in snapshot.

functionDecorators.name: totalReserve
functionDecorators.description: Total reserve value that backs all DVD in circulation.

functionDecorators.name: tradingTreasury
functionDecorators.description: Trading treasury.

functionDecorators.name: vault
functionDecorators.description: Interface for integration with mStable.
